name: Rudolph the Red Nosed Slain Deer
name_original: Rudolph the Red Nosed Slain Deer
description:
After the many years of working with Santa, Rudolph was finally let go. This is the story of how the reindeer that didn't FIT IN went from a friendly and helpful pal to a destructive monster filled with vengeance.

Controls

Basic Attack - Keyboard: J, Controller: X

Jump - Keyboard: Space, Controller: A

Move: Keyboard: WASD, Controller: Left Stick

Interact: Keyboard: Space, Controller: A

Message from Gruntled

Thank you all so much for all the support over the year from all the jam games I've been able to make. I'm so grateful to be a part of this community and I hope you all enjoy this game as much as previous games I've made. Happy Jamming!
